translations.en: ğŸª‘ You are taken to the large reception room of the castle where you quickly meet the king. Someone explains to you the nature of the competition, which is to collect a large number of points in order to dominate the rankings. In addition to a nice starting bonus, you receive a beautiful book that is supposed to guide you during your adventure. You open the book (https://guide.draftbot.com) and quickly check the first pages...

translations.en: Once you have finished reading, you are taken back to the entrance. Someone also gives you some information about some additional missions entrusted by the king to facilitate your quest (command {command:missions}) and someone offers you a transport to the capital of your choice.

translations.en: You listen patiently to the king before being taken back to the entrance. Someone also gives you some information about some additional missions entrusted by the king to facilitate your quest (command {command:missions}) and someone offers you a transport to the capital of your choice.
